component.name: OpenHome
component.summary: An open source tool for moving Pokémon between game save files

description.p: OpenHome is an open source tool for moving Pokémon between game save files, including forwards and backwards through generations, without data loss.
The Flatpak version may run into extra issues due to the nature of Flatpak sandboxing. When submitting bugs, please specify you are using the Flatpak version.

screenshot.caption: OpenHome's main interface, with three save files open.
Recently opened save files can be quickly reopened
